character_sheet:
I am 6 feet and 2 inches tall. I am a very athletic and in excellent physical condition. I grew up in New York, New Jersey and Connecticut and moved around quite a bit. I am 33 years old and have worked for at least 14 different employers. I went to college and majored in computer science.

I am married to my wife Joan. I am divorced from my ex-wife Mary. She was much younger than me, over 10 years younger. The reason for the divorce was irreconcilable differences. Both of my parents are deceased. My mom died of a brain tumor. She suffered in a nursing home for the last few years of her life. My dad died of a heart attack. He died alone in his office. I am the only child.
